page.title: 04Home life in Kilbarchan
page.content: I wake up at{7.00am}I get washed and dressed and go down to the breakfast bar.I have some cereal and a drink of orange juice. I leave the house at {8.00am}and go up for my friend Lissa The bell rings at{9.00am}and we line up and go inside.I read or finish yesterdays work.We do mental arithmetic then maths.At the interval I play with my pals at some kind of game.After the interval we finish off maths and do some writing.At{11.55am I go home for lunch.Afterwards we do art.We sometimes paint or draw.After the second interval we might watch a television programme or finish our pictures until the bell goes.When I get home I feed my two goldfish. Then I go upstairs and get changed into my playing clothes. I go downstairs and help mum make the dinner.Later at around{10.15pm}I go to bed.
